benchmark_details.name: MELABenchv1
benchmark_details.overview: A new evaluation benchmark composed of a variety of 11 discriminative and generative Maltese NLP tasks, to facilitate the evaluation and development of language technology.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation of LLMs for Maltese, a low-resource language.

data.source: A collection of publicly available Maltese datasets relevant to the identified NLP tasks.
data.annotation: Annotated based on respective tasks, including manual inputs and outputs.

methodology.calculation: Calculated based on the outputs generated by models compared to expected outputs.
methodology.interpretation: Performance metrics are compared across different models to establish benchmarks.
methodology.baseline_results: Fine-tuned models including BERTu and mT5-Small were used as baselines.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The study acknowledges the inherent risks related to biases in the data.
